dcterms:creator: B. Lake
M. Baroni
dcterms:description: The SCAN dataset consists of input natural language commands paired with output action sequences. It includes various tasks that test compositional generalization by splitting training and test sets based on specific primitives or sequence lengths.
dcterms:title: SCAN

dcterms:description: The Complex Freebase Questions (CFQ) benchmark contains input natural language questions paired with their output meaning representations in the form of SPARQL queries. It is designed to measure compositional generalization by ensuring that all primitives in the test set are also present in the training set while maximizing the divergence of compound structures.
dcterms:title: CFQ
